_xResult.title: Up in Plumes Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made neoprene jacket with double lapel
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made jacket is such a showstopper, it could be an outfit all on its own. We love the sharp collar, double breasted lapel and bell bodice, all which are complemented by the rich black neoprene fabric that fashions this coat.  This made to measure piece could be worn with high boots on its own for a modern and daring look, or over any outfit during winter months. Neoprene is an incredible fabric that adds warmth without weight, looks tailored and sculptured (and of course is rain repellent!). 

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
